question: Uttar Pradesh's Khadi and Village Industries Board signed a pact with this Ecommerce centre to facilitate online selling of Khadi products recently.
explanation: Uttar Pradesh's Khadi and Village Industries Board signed a pact with Amazon India to facilitate online selling of Khadi products. As part of a MoU, Amazon India will educate, train and enable rural khadi artisans to directly sell their products to Amazon.in customers across the country under the brand of UP Khadi.
